page.title: 02EDUCATION
page.content: TALYBONT PRIMARY SCHOOL There is only one school in our block which is the Talybont Primary School. The present School was opened in 1969 and it is a semi-open plan school. There are four classrooms each with individual cloakrooms and toilets. The reception class and infants class open their partitions on to the school hall, while the lower and top junior classrooms can either have an open or closed partition between them. There are for teachers in the school- Mr Thomas the Headmaster who teaches the top juniors, Mrs Jones the Deputy Head who teaches the infants, Mrs Charlton who teaches the 7-9 year olds and Miss Jones who teaches the top infants. There are at present 96 children in the school but 12 of them will be leaving for Secondary School at the end of this Summer Term.
